gym_normal_010_receptionist_02:
Let me register you as a challenger. Your name is
[VAR TRNAME(0000)], yes?
gym_normal_010_receptionist_03:
Great! Now, in order to face Gym Leader Larry,
you’ll first need to pass the Gym Test.
gym_normal_010_receptionist_04:
Here at the Medali Gym, that means [VAR COLOR(0006)]ordering a[VAR COLOR(0000)]
[VAR COLOR(0006)]special secret menu item[VAR COLOR(0000)]!
gym_normal_010_receptionist_05:
Specifically, a menu item at the [VAR COLOR(0006)]Treasure Eatery[VAR COLOR(0000)],
a much-loved restaurant here in Medali.\c
Order correctly, and you pass!
gym_normal_010_receptionist_06:
Right now, there are three other challengers
around town attempting this Gym Test.
gym_normal_010_receptionist_07:
Each challenger has been given a different clue
that’ll help them discover the secret dish. You’ll\r
be given a clue as well.
gym_normal_010_receptionist_08:
Please find and battle the other challengers.
The loser must tell the winner their clue!
gym_normal_010_receptionist_09:
Your goal is to gather clues and use them to
determine the secret dish, then order it from\r
the waiter at the Treasure Eatery.
gym_normal_010_receptionist_10:
Only the challenger who’s able to order correctly
will pass the test!
gym_normal_010_receptionist_11:
Your clue is to find out [VAR COLOR(0006)]how the regulars season[VAR COLOR(0000)]
[VAR COLOR(0006)]their dishes[VAR COLOR(0000)].
gym_normal_010_receptionist_12:
I’d suggest you start by hearing what a regular
at the Treasure Eatery has to say!
